thread.title: Chalk Talk: Maggard previews Cats' game with Bulldogs
thread.title_full: Chalk Talk: Maggard previews Cats' game with Bulldogs

title: Chalk Talk: Maggard previews Cats' game with Bulldogs
text:
Chalk Talk: Maggard previews Cats' game with Bulldogs Updated: Tue 12:18 AM, Oct 20, 2015 / Headlines List / Article 
LEXINGTON, Ky. (WYMT) -- In this week’s episode of “Chalk Talk,” former Kentucky quarterback Freddie Maggard and Lauren Cash discuss Kentucky’s upcoming game with Mississippi State (5-2). 
If the Bulldogs win, it would make them bowl eligible for the sixth consecutive season. 
"This is my seventh press conference with Coach Mark Stoops. I was more impressed with him today than any of those before I thought he showed emotion about the Melvin Lewis injury and showed his human side,” Maggard said Monday. “Also, talked responsibility with the 8 men on the punt and that the coaches could be better. I like he talked about his team learning. " 
For more of Maggard’s thoughts, check out the video above.
